Threads

Class PointOnVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Threads.PointOnVector

  • public class PointOnVector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Point on vector between packman and fruit in the game.
    Author:
    Roi Abramovitch & Gal Hadida

    • Constructor Summary
